description:
Palmolive Naturals Bar Soap Moisture Care is made with Milk & Honey extracts.

Palmolive Naturals Milk & Honey Moisture Care bar soap is formulated with moisturising ingredients to help retain your skin's natural moisture.

Our Palmolive Naturals body bar soaps 98% naturally derived and expertly blended with natural milk and honey. Enjoy a light and sweet honey scent with a smooth milky notes, it feels like the warm sun on a cold day.

- Triple Milled for Quality
- 98% Naturally Derived
- 100% Natural Milk & Honey
- Dermatologically Tested
- Long Lasting Fragrance

What we leave out is as important as what we put in
0% Parabens, Phthalates and Mineral Oil.

With Ingredients that your skin will love.

Pack contains: 4 x 90g body bar soaps

GENTLYCLEANSES AND REMOVES GERMS: Transforms into a luxurious creamy lather, leaving skin feeling clean and smooth with regular use

98 PERCENT NATURALLY DERIVED FORMULA: Enriched with natural milk and honey

WITH MOISTURISING INGREDIENTS: To help maintain skin's natural moisture

LIGHT AND SWEET SCENT: A light and sweet honey scent with a smooth milky notes, it feels like the warm sun on a cold day.

MADE WITH: Ingredients that your skin will love.
name: Palmolive Naturals Replenishing Bar Soap Milk & Honey 90G x4 Pack
